caseTitle: Meeru Khan v. Mst. Naheed Aziz Siddiqui & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Powers of Court under Section 149, CPC. (2) Sections 4 and 6 of the Court Fees Act, 1870. (3) The collective effect of Order VII, Rule 11 and Section 149, CPC. (4) Distinction between Sections 148 & 149 CPC. (5) The Court is bound to ascertain any deficiency in the court fee and technicalities should be avoided.
